channel.title: [317] Searching for players and few staff members
channel.description:
Hello guys, im creating new project, i need players for test server. Im searching for staff members too.
About:
Home at edgeville PVP Items such as Vesta, Statius, Morrigans etc. Spirit Shields Most special attacks work correctly, including dragon claws, godswords, vls, whip Custom Colored Whips with working anims and specials Korasi's Sword with working special attack Working ring of wealth. Auto-Join Clan Chat on login Easy Barrows System Most dupes fixed, most bugs squashed Re-Written buyItem Method, no lag caused by buying items Working Overloads Pk Point Shops Added most NPC spawns to the base Good Starter Items Working mystery boxes Extra Raredrop table Auto Cache Downloader Staff Login Messages Custom Quest Tab Server guide @ Home Auto-Voting and Vote Points Good XP rates Decent drop rates Shared Points System between slayer and pking. Ability to bank all items Working Minigames Working Bosses Working Turmoil Double xp weekends Most bugs and dupes fixed
skype: samp.lukascool

item.title: [317] Searching for players and few staff members
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

I logged in to the server it was super fun. Home is well organized great choice of shops and npcs very easy to get around. Training isn’t hard it’s also not easy very good for pkers. Wild is full players always online wanting to pk or duel so very fun also tons of custom content and bosses and minigames and all skills work 100 seriously IA beat server I ever played. Check it out before Jagex shuts it down!

Read full topic
